name: places/ChIJK9jQswNbwokR09t2wo0c3nA
formattedAddress: 120 E 64th St, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 120 E 64th St, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text: Had a great experience using Dr. Yael. She is knowledgeable and professional. I have complete confidence in her ability to treat me. When I was pregnant with my son I had a calm and easy pregnancy because I knew that I was in good hands. If she was not concerned, I knew I did not have to worry. Every time I go for an appointment I feel like I am her only patient for the day. She gives me as much time as I need, and I never feel rushed. I feel that she is genuinely concerned about my welfare and she has even called me at home to check on how I was doing. I find her to be the most caring, compassionate, skillful, and experienced doctor I have encountered. I highly recommend.

originalText.text:
Dr. Fuchs is one of the most compassionate and knowledgeable doctors we have ever used! Her genuine care and concern for all her patients coupled with her skills are unparalleled!
We incidentally met her while we were in the hospital, my wife in labor with our first child. We were unable to get through to our doctor, and Dr. Fuchs who heard the commotion arrived like an angel and took such loving care of us as though we were her patients. Of course, we switched to her practice for our next and could not have been happier!
Every visit with her is an absolute pleasure. She’s been so patient and is always willing to address any concerns we have.
Would absolutely recommend her to anyone looking to use a knowledgeable doctor who goes above and beyond for anyone in need!

originalText.text: Dr Fuchs is an excellent provider. I have reached out to her on several occasions. Whenever I needed her she came through with a level of expertise I haven't seen elsewhere. She delivered six of my grandchildren and provided excellent GYN care to us. I highly recommend her.

text.text: Dr Fuchs is an excellent provider. I have reached out to her on several occasions. Whenever I needed her she came through with a level of expertise I haven't seen elsewhere. She delivered six of my grandchildren and provided excellent GYN care to us. I highly recommend her.

originalText.text: I went to Dr. Fuchs' office in Brooklyn recently and I was so happy!  She gave me great care and was thorough and compassionate.  I didn't feel rushed because after my exam, she spoke with me in her office at length.  She explained and educated me on menopause and seemed to understand the feelings that I could not put into words.  Her staff was excellent and her office was clean and welcoming.  I would highly recommend Dr. Fuchs for anyone needing a gynecologist.

originalText.text: Dr Fuchs is the best! She has unbelievable patience, takes time to listen and actually cares. Genuine doctors are hard to find these days. I trust her 100% with all my healthcare concerns. She is a great diagnostician.  I can explain something to her and she knows exactly what it is. Absolutely love her-doctor jackpot!!!
